item.title: All-in-One Image Coding for Joint Human-Machine Vision with Multi-Path Aggregation
item.description: Multi-Path Aggregation (MPA) achieves comparable performance to state-of-the-art methods in multi-task image coding, by unifying feature representations with a novel all-in-one architecture and a two-…
